data.actual_result: It's actually saying something like "The app needs to access your storage so you send attachments", which is out of context
data.expected_result: Should say something like "The app needs to access your storage so you can change avatar"
data.short_description: (Android 6+) Toast showing up when changing avatar without giving the app storage permissions is referring to message attachments
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure Discord isn't granted permission to access your phone's storage - Go to your account settings where you can change avatar. Also works when changing server and group DM icons  - Tap your avatar - When Discord is requesting access to your storage, choose Refuse - Observe the error toast showing up
